update.description: Changed calculation of parent link force/torque. Force on child is calculated in world frame (was child frame before), where the parent force/torque can simply be the negative of the child force/torque (before, parent force/torque was set to the negative child force/torque, which was specified in child link frame and was added to the overall torque in parent link frame). Now all torques are calculated in world frame, summed up and transformed into child and parent frame in the end.
update.title: changed the calculation of force/torque on parent link for gazebo::physics::ODEJoint::GetForceTorque()

pull_request.title: changed the calculation of force/torque on parent link for gazebo::physics::ODEJoint::GetForceTorque()

content.raw:
ok, I've created issue #1975 and will decline this pull request for now

If you have any ideas about a scenario in which the current code is broken, we can work on writing a test for it.

Thanks again for the contribution!
content.html:
ok, I've created issue #1975 and will decline this pull request for now

If you have any ideas about a scenario in which the current code is broken, we can work on writing a test for it.

Thanks again for the contribution!

update.description: Changed calculation of parent link force/torque. Force on child is calculated in world frame (was child frame before), where the parent force/torque can simply be the negative of the child force/torque (before, parent force/torque was set to the negative child force/torque, which was specified in child link frame and was added to the overall torque in parent link frame). Now all torques are calculated in world frame, summed up and transformed into child and parent frame in the end.
update.title: changed the calculation of force/torque on parent link for gazebo::physics::ODEJoint::GetForceTorque()
